question.title: Deploy Jar to Remote Repo Maven
question.body:
I am trying to build jackson-databind jar from source and then upload it to a remote repo using maven.

I have already added the repo credentials in setting.xml file and added repo in pom.xml of the project file.

<distributionManagement>
    <repository>
        <id> Same_as_setting.xml </id>
        <name> RepoName </name>
        <url> RepoURL </url>
    </repository>
</distributionManagement>

Using this command for the task:

mvn clean deploy -DskipTests

Till the install task it working fine and the jar is getting created in the target folder but after that task its failing!!!

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy (injected-nexus-deploy) on project jackson-databind: Execution injected-nexus-deploy of goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy failed: Server credentials with ID "sonatype-nexus-staging" not found! -> [Help 1]
org.apache.maven.lifecycle.LifecycleExecutionException: Failed to execute goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy (injected-nexus-deploy) on project jackson-databind: Execution injected-nexus-deploy of goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy failed: Server credentials with ID "sonatype-nexus-staging" not found!

I am able not to figure if this is really required and if not how do I disable this task. I tried manually adding the plugin (as mentioned below) in pom.xml and disable it but didn't work.

<plugin>
   <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
   <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
   <version>1.6.13</version>
   <executions>
     <execution>
       <id>injected-nexus-deploy</id>
       <phase>none</phase>
     </execution>
   </executions>
</plugin>

Complete error stacktrace

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy (injected-nexus-deploy) on project jackson-databind: Execution injected-nexus-deploy of goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy failed: Server credentials with ID "sonatype-nexus-staging" not found! -> [Help 1]
org.apache.maven.lifecycle.LifecycleExecutionException: Failed to execute goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy (injected-nexus-deploy) on project jackson-databind: Execution injected-nexus-deploy of goal org.sonatype.plugins:nexus-staging-maven-plugin:1.6.13:deploy failed: Server credentials with ID "sonatype-nexus-staging" not found!

I don't have password for sonatype-nexus-staging, moreover I don't want to deploy to there.
